    • Method Detail

      • getInvocationStrategy

        protected InvocationStrategy getInvocationStrategy(DataSource dataSource,
                                       Method method,
                                       Object[] parameters)
                                            throws SQLException
        Returns the appropriate InvocationStrategy for the specified method. This implementation detects Wrapper methods; and Object.equals(java.lang.Object), Object.hashCode(), and Object.toString(). Default invocation strategy is InvokeOnAllInvocationStrategy.
        Overrides:
        getInvocationStrategy in class CommonDataSourceInvocationHandler<DataSource,DataSourceDatabase>
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the proxied object
        method - the method to invoke
        parameters - the method invocation parameters
        Returns:
        an invocation strategy
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        CommonDataSourceInvocationHandler.getInvocationStrategy(javax.sql.CommonDataSource, java.lang.reflect.Method, java.lang.Object[])
